name: Don't Shoot Anybody
description:
Shoot to propel yourself through difficult stages, just make sure your bullets don't hit the adorable bunnies scattering the ground!

The game can be beaten quickly but challenges you return to levels to master its mechanics, decrease your time and stop shooting bunnies! Can you finish each level without shooting anybody?

Don't Shoot Anybody is a game for those who love difficult challenges, the joy of victory, and a bit of rage ever once in a while!

Controls: 

  • Point and shoot with the mouse.
  • Esc for the pause menu which uses arrow keys.

Thanks for playing!
